thread.title: LSU leads Western Kentucky 14-7 at halftime
thread.title_full: LSU leads Western Kentucky 14-7 at halftime - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Posted by WAFB Staff
title: LSU leads Western Kentucky 14-7 at halftime
text:
BATON ROUGE, LA (WAFB) - No. 5 LSU (6-0) is hosting Western Kentucky (6-1) in Tiger Stadium for homecoming Saturday night.
SCORING PLAYS:
1st QTR
LSU: Open the game on defense.
WKU: 1st possession - Punt
LSU: *1st possession - Harris to Dupre TD 55 yards. The drive consisted of 4 consecutive runs by Fournette and 1 pass from Harris.
WKU 0, LSU 7 - 1st Qtr. 12:13 remaining.
WKU: Sack by D. Jones - Punt
LSU: 1 penalty, 3 runs by Fournette, - Punt
WKU: Turnover on downs. Deep in LSU territory, W. Kentucky doesn't convert 4-18.
LSU: Punt
WKU: Punt
LSU:
END of the 1st - WKU 0 LSU 7
LSU cont'd: Punt
WKU: Shovel pass by Doughty to Wales, 7 yds. Key play: D'Andre Ferby run for 35 yards to the LSU 3.
WKU 7, LSU 7 - 2nd Qtr. 10:55 remaining
LSU: Punt
WKU: Punt
LSU: Williams TD, 2 yds. Key play: Harris to Dural 67 yds. Scoring drive: 6 plays, 96 yds.
WKU 7, LSU 14 - 2nd Qtr. 1:25 remaining
WKU: Punt
LSU: End of the half.
Halftime: WKU 7, LSU 14
